entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -12.3°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 79 %

Dewpoint: -15.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
